feed.title: Jekyll Boilerplate
feed.subtitle: Jekyll Boilerplate is a theme-less, plugin-less clean starting point for Jekyll sites where you want to run only your own code.

entry.title: Example Post 5
entry.summary: You can put a custom excerpt in front matter.
